Title: Establishes protections for the rights of pregnant students, parenting students, and students with pregnancy-related conditions in schools
Summary: Establishes protections for the rights of pregnant students, parenting students, and students with pregnancy-related conditions in schools; requires schools to establish liaison officers for such students and to disseminate information relating to resources available to such students.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to protecting rights of pregnant students, parenting students, and students with pregnancy-related conditions in schools and education
